pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows xp and above
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB vram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Needed
